title: I'm sad
body: Not really. I just wanted to break my self-imposed, apostrophe-free post title record. You see, up until this point, none of the post's titles have ever had an apostrophe in them... it would've screwed up my hand-made comment system, but not anymore! I have a bright, apostrophe-filled future to look forward too!
author: Dan

comments.author: Oz
comments.body: But this is good news!  Why not title your post "I'm Ecstatic that I Have Apostrophe Freedom!"?

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I was aiming for pity points.
